dcterms:creator: M. Weber
G. Domeniconi
J. Chen
D. Weidele
C. Bellei
T. Robinson
C. E. Leiserson
dcterms:description: A dataset containing real Bitcoin transactions represented as a directed graph network, where transactions are nodes and directed edges represent fund flows from source to destination addresses. The dataset includes features related to the transactions and their graph structure.
dcterms:title: Bitcoin transactions dataset
